price: Kepunyaan-Nya-lah kunci-kunci (perbendaharaan) langit dan bumi.  Dan orang-orang yang kafir terhadap ayat-ayat Allah, mereka itulah orang-orang yang merugi.
arabic: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lahu maqālīdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyāti al-lahi ulāika humu al-khāsirūna
